sentences.en: ...a complete set of Dickens bound in imitation leather.
sentences.cn: …用人造革装帧的一整套《狄更斯全集》。

sentences.en: " Explain,'said Mr. Bamberger, giving a modified imitation.
sentences.cn: “ 你要解释清楚. " 班贝格先生有点走样地模仿着.

sentences.en: Elsewhere imitation and artifice play a part.
sentences.cn: 在其他领域里,模仿和技巧起了一定作用.

sentences.en: Erik had been seen in flannels and an imitation Panama hat.
sentences.cn: 人们看到埃里克身穿法兰绒裤,头戴仿制巴拿马草帽.

sentences.en: He gave his imitation of Queen Elizabeth's royal wave.
sentences.cn: 他模仿伊丽莎白女王挥手致意。

sentences.en: I could do a pretty good imitation of him.
sentences.cn: 我可以惟妙惟肖地学他的样子。

sentences.en: It is said that imitation is the sincerest flattery.
sentences.cn: 据说,模仿是最真诚的奉承.

sentences.en: It's not real leather; it's only an imitation.
sentences.cn: 那不是真皮, 只不过是仿制品.

sentences.en: Molly learned her golf by imitation.
sentences.cn: 莫莉通过模仿学会了打高尔夫球。

sentences.en: She wore an imitation of a sailor’s hat.
sentences.cn: 她戴着一顶仿制的水手帽。

sentences.en: Stan puffed out his thin cheeks in a passable imitation of his dad.
sentences.cn: 斯坦鼓起瘦瘦的脸颊，像模像样地模仿着他的爸爸。

sentences.en: The diamond in that ring is only a glass imitation.
sentences.cn: 那只戒指上的钻石仅仅是玻璃仿造品.

sentences.en: The imitation hardly matches up to the original.
sentences.cn: 这个仿制品简直不能同原件相比.

sentences.en: The remake of ‘Casablanca’ was a pale imitation (= something that is much less good than the thing it imitates ) of the original movie.
sentences.cn: 重拍的《卡萨布兰卡》远不如原版。

sentences.en: The vase is an imitation of the one in the museum.
sentences.cn: 这只花瓶是博物馆那只的仿制品.

sentences.en: Their version of jazz funk is a pale imitation of the real thing.
sentences.cn: 他们演奏的音乐不过是对真正的乡土爵士乐的拙劣模仿.

sentences.en: They discussed important issues in imitation of their elders.
sentences.cn: 他们模仿长辈的口气讨论重要问题。

sentences.en: Young children learn how to speak by imitation.

phrases.phrase: imitation is the sincerest form of flattery

trans.tran_en: Imitation things are not genuine but are made to look as if they are

trans.tran_cn: 模仿，仿效，仿制品，赝品，[生]拟态
trans.tran_en: when you copy someone else’s actions
